title: Message to the Chamber of Commerce of Curwensville, Pennsylvania.
text:
My dear Mr. Dale:

I have your encouraging letter of March 9th. As an indication of my feeling toward a community that shows the stamina which Curwensville has displayed, I have today given copies of it to the press. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [J. Thomas Dale, Secretary, Chamber of Commerce, Curwensville, Pennsylvania]
